statements: DELETE FROM clinical_trials WHERE trial_name = 'Sample Trial';
DELETE FROM clinical_trials WHERE patient_id = 123 AND medication = 'Aspirin';
DELETE FROM clinical_trials WHERE patient_id = 456 AND medication = 'Ibuprofen' AND dosage < 25;
DELETE FROM Participants WHERE participant_id = 1 AND trial_id = 1;
DELETE FROM Trials WHERE sponsor = 'Company A';
DELETE FROM Trials WHERE trial_id = 1 AND sponsor = 'Company A';
DELETE FROM Participants WHERE trial_id = 3 AND age > 50;
DELETE FROM Trials WHERE status = 'Completed' AND end_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE age > 40 AND gender = 'Female';
DELETE FROM Samples WHERE sample_type = 'Blood' AND quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM Trials WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-06-30';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE age < 20 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM treatments WHERE dosage > 100 AND medication = 'Aspirin';
